# featureSettings

**Type Property**

An array of dictionaries representing non-default font feature settings.

## Declaration

```swift
static let featureSettings: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray] of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDictionary] objects. Each dictionary contains [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontDescriptor/FeatureKey/typeIdentifier] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontDescriptor/FeatureKey/selectorIdentifier].

## Font Attributes

- **family**: An optional string object that specifies the font family.
- **name**: An optional string object that specifies the font name.
- **face**: An optional string object that specifies the font face.
- **size**: An optional floating-point number that specifies the font size.
- **visibleName**: An optional string object that specifies the font’s visible name.
- **matrix**: An affine transform that specifies the font’s transformation matrix.
- **variation**: A dictionary that describes the font’s variation axis.
- **characterSet**: The set of Unicode characters covered by the font.
- **cascadeList**: An array, each member of which is a sub-descriptor.
- **traits**: A dictionary that fully describes the font traits.
- **fixedAdvance**: A floating-point value that overrides the glyph advancement specified by the font.
